thread.title: Oscars 2017: 'Moonlight' outshines 'La La Land' to win Best Picture award
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: 'Moonlight' outshines 'La La Land' to win Best Picture award

author: India TV Entertainment Desk
title: Oscars 2017: 'Moonlight' outshines 'La La Land' to win Best Picture award
text:
Oscars 2017: 'Moonlight' outshines 'La La Land' to win Best Picture award Oscars 2017: 'Moonlight' outshines 'La La Land' to win Best Picture award The 89th Academy Awards commenced at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles in grand fashion with a record-tying 14 nominations.   Los Angeles [ Updated: 27 Feb 2017, 11:30:03] Oscars 2017 LIVE: 'Moonlight' outshines 'La La Land' to win Best Picture award The 89th Academy Awards commenced at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles in grand fashion with a record-tying 14 nominations. 
"La La Land" hit headlines after it was nominated for 14 Oscars, the only film to have matched the nomination record of 1998 super hit "Titanic". 
The critically acclaimed "Manchester by the Sea", featuring Casey Affleck and Michelle Williams, was nominated for five Academy Awards and has taken the world by storm, with about 35 per cent more holiday makers considering a trip to Boston and the beautiful coastal towns the movie has captured. Indian-origin British actor Dev Patel – who is in contention for Best Actor in a Supporting Role trophy for "Lion" at Oscars – brought his mother Anita to attend the 89th Academy Awards ceremony here. 
Here are the live updates: Biggest goof up as presenters read it wrong. "Moonlight" wins Oscar for Best Film, not "La La Land" Biggest goof up as presenters read it wrong. "Moonlight" wins Oscar for Best Film, not "La La Land" #Oscars pic.twitter.com/BkUu5Go7XI Emma Stone wins Best Actor (Female) Leading Role for La La Land Emma Stone wins Best Actor (Female) Leading Role for La La Land #Oscars pic.twitter.com/BxWWj04eaD Damien Chazelle wins Best Director for La La Land Damien Chazelle wins Best Director for La La Land #Oscars pic.twitter.com/VxWEN4Pkp7 Casey Affleck wins Best Actor (Male) in Leading Role for Manchester by the Sea Casey Affleck wins Best Actor (Male) in Leading Role for Manchester by the Sea #Oscars pic.twitter.com/pQRWU811yo "The Jungle Book" wins the Academy Award in the Best Visual Effects category "The Jungle Book" wins the Academy Award in the Best Visual Effects category #Oscars pic.twitter.com/YHQReabNUq "Zootopia" wins the award for Best Animated Feature Film "Zootopia" wins the award for Best Animated Feature Film #Oscars pic.twitter.com/q3rnYAov2C
